pullRequest.title: Exam exercise submission exam components (text & modeling)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes

Motivation and Context


As a lot of functionality is not used for the exam mode, we decided to create an own component for the participation of text and modeling exercises for the exam mode.
Description


Removed unnecessary functions and DOM elements for text and modeling exercises
ParticipationId is now an input
The participate exam components will not have the updated version of the layout from #1653. This will be added after #1653 was merged in a follow up PR

Steps for Testing

Can only be tested locally until student exam participations are loaded into the exam view
Setup:
You need to give the new components the participationId as input, therefore you need to create new participation for each exercise in order to test.


Add <jhi-text-editor-exam> to exam-participation.component.html and hand over the participationId of your newly created participation. You should be able to use the text editor as always.


Add <jhi-modeling-submission-exam> to exam-participation.component.html and hand over the participationId of your newly created participation. Use this.modelingSubmissionService.getLatestSubmissionForModelingEditor instead of the ExamParticipationService. You should be able to use modeling editor as always.



Log in to Artemis
Navigate to /courses/{courseId}/exams/{examsId}
Test the components, they should work as always

This should be re-tested thoroughly in the future.
Screenshots


NOTE: This is still the "old" layout, this will be updated in a follow up PR
Text Exercise:

Modeling Exercise:
